metadata.title: CVE-2021-44501 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in FIS GT.M through V7.0-000 (related to theYottaDB code base). Using crafted input, an attacker can cause calls toZRead to crash due to a NULL pointer dereference.

criterions.comment: fis-gtm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
